caption:
The photograph depicts a subway station platform at night. The lighting is subdued, mainly coming from overhead lights along the platform, which spreads a dim, greenish hue throughout the scene. On the left side of the image, a person sits alone on a bench, holding a bag and looking down, possibly waiting for a train. This individual appears to be a young woman dressed in casual attire.

In the middle of the platform, there is a large informational billboard with writings and maps, understandable as station guides or advertisements. The text indicates the station name "Schmidt-Platz". To the right, continuing along the platform, another individual stands alone near additional billboards that display various posters and signs.

On the far right, the subway train is in motion, captured as a blur indicating its speed as it enters the station. The train's front features visible lights illuminating parts of the track ahead. The platform itself is clean and well-maintained, with a simple design featuring a flat ceiling and a straightforward, uncluttered layout. The atmosphere of the photograph conveys a quiet, somewhat isolating experience of public transportation at night.
title: Trolley line beneath the plaza of the town hall
